titleStmt.title: The last efforts of afflicted innocence being an account of the persecution of the Protestants of France, and a vindication of the reformed religion from the aspersions of disloyalty and rebellion, charg'd on it by the papists / translated out of French.
Derniers efforts de l'innocence affligée. English
titleStmt.author: Jurieu, Pierre, 1637-1713.
Vaughan, Walter.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for M. Magnes and R. Bentley ...,
